sent.orig: This pair of trousers is Lucy's. Your trousers are on your bed.
sent.trans: 这条长裤是露西的。你的长裤在你的床上。

sent.orig: My trousers are blue. That pair of trousers is black.
sent.trans: 我的裤子是蓝色的，那条是黑色的。

sent.orig: Man wears underwear under the trousers and superman wears it over the trousers.
sent.trans: 普通人把内裤穿里边，超人把内裤穿外面。

sent.orig: The drayman's dog attacked the stranger, tearing his glove an dripping his trousers.
sent.trans: 车夫的狗袭击了陌生人，撕破了他的手套，扯裂了他的裤子。

sent.orig: I should say this shirt matches your trousers fabulously.
sent.trans: 我得说这衬衫同你的裤子非常相配。
